contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XEYP | image = | city = [[Ciudad Mante]], [[Tamaulipas]] | area = [[Ciudad Mante]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Mundo 1520 | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 1520 AM | format = | power = | erp = 1000 W | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = Organizacion Radiotelefonica Tamaulipeca | webcast = | website = www.ort.com.mx | affiliations = }} Station '''XEYP''' (branded as Mundo 1520) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] regional station that serves [[Ciudad Mante]], [[Tamaulipas]]. ==External links== * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio / television stations] * [http://radiostationworld.com/locations/Mexico/radio.asp?m=ta~ radiostationworld.com; List of Tamaulipas radio stations] <br clear=all> {{Ciudad Mante Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Ciudad Mante]]
